DOC.brief_summary: Cancer is the number one killer in Canada and in most countries of the world. The investigators' initial assessment indicates that far infrared radiation has the potential to cure cancer.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Effect of Far Infrared Radiation for Cancer Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators have identified a combination of methods for possible cancer treatment as follows: 1. Energy specific far infrared radiation (5 μm to 20 μm ). No x-rays, gamma rays etc. are used. 2. Oxygenation of the body cells 3. pH balance 4. Lifestyle changes, or 5. A combination of chemotherapy and (1), (2), (3) and (4) above.
